column5: well i went down way later then i was hoping to today. i got to the marina by 2:30. the water was very murky and could see maybe 10" down  . so the perch fishin was tuff for the most part, caught maybe 50 fish by the time i had to leave.  i only got 4 perch over 10" that were worth keepin, and had a nice size pike almost rip a perch right off my hook lol.  but still better then sittin at home all day wishin i was fishin   lol. so i hope that this water will clear up soon, and the perch will be hittin agian.  pikeie
thanks for the update.  4 over 10 inches is better than what I saw people doing yesterday.  Those pike in there must be on a feeding frenzy right now...just swim around with mouth open!
That's probably what had the perch hiding this morning, one lousy pike in the marina and everything goes for a ..damm snotrockets.
yea i know what you mean fisherman. i think tomarrow i am goin to bring down my fav pike rod, and toss around some chubs, suckers, and maybe some jerk baits. we will see what happens.
Congrats Pikeie. You toughed it out and got a few nice fish. Thanks for the report.
